attributes.action: For the FA CUP to give 2 NON LEAGUE TEAMS a bye to 3rd round!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-ignite the beautiful game and give a bye to 2 non-league teams to round 3. The romance of the FA Cup seeing Arsenal, Liverpool, Manchester United and Chelsea play a non league team. Also a second rond team may be pitched against the non league team giving them a chance to get through to the next round. Everyones a winner. And gives something back to grass roots football.
Please Sign now for the future of Football and the FA-CUP.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
